title.rendered: Piklist v0.9.4.30 and v0.9.9.8 beta for WordPress 4.5

content.rendered:
Maintenance releases for Piklist are now available. These releases only add support for WordPress 4.5. No other features or fixes are included.

If you’re running 0.9.4.29, you can upgrade to version 0.9.4.30 in your WordPress admin.

To upgrade to the latest beta, download it here >

excerpt.rendered: Maintenance releases for Piklist are now available. These releases only add support for WordPress 4.5. No other features or fixes are included.
